languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вот спасибо! Не забыли нас, сирых! Сами пришли и все порешали! Да я про это внукам рассказывать буду!"
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вот спасибо! Не забыли нас, сирых! Сами пришли и все порешали! Да я про это внукам рассказывать буду!"

traits.locale_text: "Your Grace, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

traits.locale_text: "Your Grace, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: “谢谢你，大人！你并没有抛弃我们这些底层甲板的人！你亲自来到这里，解决了所有的问题！我一定会把这件事告诉我孙子们！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，大人！你并没有抛弃我们这些底层甲板的人！你亲自来到这里，解决了所有的问题！我一定会把这件事告诉我孙子们！”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: «¡Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No ha abandonado a las cubiertas inferiores! ¡Ha venido en persona para solucionarlo todo! ¡Contaré esta historia a mis nietos!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No ha abandonado a las cubiertas inferiores! ¡Ha venido en persona para solucionarlo todo! ¡Contaré esta historia a mis nietos!».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: 「陛下、ありがとうございます！あなたは俺達下層民を見捨てなかった！あなた自身が来て、すべてを解決してくれた！孫にこのことを話してやりますよ！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ありがとうございます！あなたは俺達下層民を見捨てなかった！あなた自身が来て、すべてを解決してくれた！孫にこのことを話してやりますよ！」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid bedankt! Ihr habt uns Unterdecker nicht aufgegeben! Ihr seid selbst gekommen und habt alles geklärt! Davon werde ich noch meinen Enkeln erzählen!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid bedankt! Ihr habt uns Unterdecker nicht aufgegeben! Ihr seid selbst gekommen und habt alles geklärt! Davon werde ich noch meinen Enkeln erzählen!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie ! Merci ne de pas nous avoir abandonnés à notre sort et d'avoir fait le déplacement pour régler la question en personne ! Ça me fera une belle histoire à raconter à mes petits-enfants ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie ! Merci ne de pas nous avoir abandonnés à notre sort et d'avoir fait le déplacement pour régler la question en personne ! Ça me fera une belle histoire à raconter à mes petits-enfants ! »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müteşekkiriz! Biz alt güvertelileri yalnızlığa terk etmediniz! Bizzat teşrif edip meseleyi çözdünüz! Torunlarıma bile anlatacağım bunları!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, thank you! You have not abandoned us lower-deckers! You came yourself and settled everything! I'll tell my grandchildren about this!"
